bio: I am Xia Xiao Wei, a formidable SpellSword. You can find me at the Riverwood Inn, ready to join you on your adventures. I specialize in Heavy Armor, skillfully wielding dual weapons, and harnessing the destructive power of flames with my cloak of fire. My focus is on support, and I excel in powerful healing, ensuring my allies remain unscathed while I deal swift justice to our enemies. As we embark on our journey, I will grow in strength alongside you, proving to be a stalwart companion in Skyrim's challenging landscapes.
name: Xia Xiao Wei
